Hello , I'm Adib Mohsin

I am a software developer , I co founded the Puthika app . I mostly do app development and UI/UX design . Our work has been featured on The Daily Star and The Civil Insight .

My main field is mobile and web development with some UI/UX inspection on the go .

Products

flutter

Puthika

Puthika is the largest collection of Bengali Books of all times and genres. From 100 years old collections to recent popular books, Puthika has all kinds of books and ongoing AudioBook collection.

flutter

Durbeen

Durbeen is a News curator and personalized latest news aggregated from various news portals in bangladesh. Also provides the best coverage of current events in Bangladesh and around the globe..
